Experience

Connected Labs Quality Assurance Engineer Date: Jan/2016 - April/2016

I tested a variety of different software applications and hardware devices using multiple platforms including iOS, tvOS, Android and Web. In addition, I wrote test scripts using Selenium Web driver and Calabash Android in order to automate web and app testing in adherence to client demands. Through the use of Swagger’s framework, I gained experience in API testing for web applications. Similarly, I built upon my background in Pivotal Tracker and Bugzilla.

Obero Solutions Quality Assurance Manager Date: March/2015 - Aug/2015

Over the course of a term, I created Obero Solutions web application testing system. Each new application was tested for bugs and reviewed to ensure compliance to client needs after each sprint. Alongside this project, I developed Obero Solutions Business Requirement and Build Release documents for their Incentive Compensation Management web application while working closely with our clientele and the primary development team.

Personal Project iOS Game Development Date: Jan/2016 - Present

I used obj-c to create a reaction based game involving UIGestureRecognizers, SpriteKit Particle Emitters and Facebooks POP Animation Engine. Please check it out on my github page!

Learna Math and English Tutor Date: Nov./2011 - May/2013

I tutored children from ages 5-12 in both Math and English, which provided me the opportunity to work alongside teachers from which I gained valuable leadership and communications skills.

Turner Fenton SS Mentorship Developer Date: Feb./2011 – Sept./2011

I helped smooth the transition into high school and the IBMYP (International Baccalaureate) program for incoming freshmen. I introduced important concepts of the program to the group that I was given responsibility over.

University of Waterloo Course Work Date: Sept/2014 - Present

• Algorithms and Data Structures: Learned various efficient sorting and graphing algorithms along with multiple data structures
• Engineering Design with Embedded Systems: Studied SDLC and Android (java) development
• Digital Circuits and Systems: Experience with Altera FPGAs, along with state machines and VHDL programming
